abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Emergency Support to Enhance Food Security Project is to
            increase domestic production of food crops (mainly maize and
            rice) in targeted areas, in order to mitigate the short-term
            impact of increasing prices on households and to expand food
            crops farmers' access to agricultural inputs in the
            medium- and long term. The closing date for Benin, project
            will be extended from August 31, 2011 until December 31,
            2011. The extension of closing date is required to allow the
            recipient to complete all project activities. The extension
            will in particular provide additional time and resources to
            complete the activities.
